messages.subject: OT: japanese stores in Boston?
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry about the OT but I need some help. I m about to take a trip to Boston, Massachusetts in 2 weeks and I was wondering if anyone knew of some stores that
messages.messageBody:
Sorry about the OT but I need some help. I'm about to take a trip to Boston,
Massachusetts in 2 weeks and I was wondering if anyone knew of some stores
that sells Japanese manga, anime and movies. Any help would be great. Thanks!



Kurai


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
